subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Anybody know the Ghost Adventures Guys?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well, you're in luck! The guy that makes it just happens to be a
member--recall the discussion over the RT. I would expect the same
reaction-- we do not know what we are talking about, even though every
advancement in the box is from this group.

 F-S



On Fri, Dec 10, 2010 at 9:32 PM, <urkel23@aol.com> wrote:

>
>
>
> I watched another great episode tonight at the Villasca Axe Murder house
> and it was a good show, but....
>
> It seems the main focus on their show is evp's and spirit communication,
> which is preferred for my taste.  But they are using the sb7 ghost box.
> That is the worst box to use for spirit communication, it gets poor
> reception and the sweep is horrible.  Any voices that could and do come
> through are drowned out by the unnecessary white noise incorporated into the
> sweep.
>
> I would like to get in touch with them and give them a quality ghost box to
> work with.
>
> So.....Does anybody know how i can get a hold of these guys?
>
> -Steve H.
